00006 template <class T> class Row {
00007   private:
00008     std::vector<T> *values_;
00009   public:
00010     Row(const Row &nh) {
00011       values_ = new std::vector<T>(*(nh.values_));
00012     }
00013 
00014     Row(unsigned int vertices, const T &initialValue) {
00015       values_ = new std::vector<T>(vertices, initialValue);
00016     }
00017 
00018     ~Row() {
00019       delete values_;
00020     }
00021 
00022     Row &operator=(const Row &nh) {
00023       *this->values_ = *nh.values_;
00024       return *this;
00025     }
00026 
00027     T &operator[](unsigned int i) {
00028       return (*values_)[i];
00029     }
00030 };

00032 template <class T> class Matrix {
00033   protected:
00034     std::vector< Row<T> > *matrix_;
00035     unsigned int rows_;
00036     unsigned int cols_;
00037   public:
00038     Matrix(unsigned int rows, unsigned int cols, const T &initialValue) {
00039       matrix_ = new std::vector< Row<T> >(rows, Row<T> (cols, initialValue));
00040       rows_ = rows;
00041       cols_ = cols;
00042     };
00043 
00044     ~Matrix() {
00045       delete matrix_;
00046     }
00047 
00048     Matrix(const Matrix &matrix) {
00049       matrix_ = new std::vector < Row<T> >(matrix.rows(), Row<T>(matrix.cols(), 0));
00050       *matrix_ = *(matrix.matrix_);
00051       rows_ = matrix.rows();
00052       cols_ = matrix.cols();
00053     }
00054 
00055     Row<T> &operator[](unsigned int i) {
00056       return (*matrix_)[i];
00057     }
00058 
00059     Matrix<T> &operator=(const Matrix<T> &matrix) {
00060       *this->matrix_ = *matrix.matrix_;
00061       rows_ = matrix.rows();
00062       cols_ = matrix.cols();
00063       return *this;
00064     }
00065 
00066     unsigned int rows() const {
00067       return rows_;
00068     }
00069 
00070     unsigned int cols() const {
00071       return cols_;
00072     }
00073 };

00075 class Graph {
00076   public:
00077     virtual ~Graph() {}
00078     virtual void add_edge(unsigned int v, unsigned int w) = 0;
00079     virtual bool is_edge(unsigned int v, unsigned int w) const = 0;
00080     virtual void remove_edge(unsigned int v, unsigned int w) = 0;
00081     virtual unsigned int number_of_vertices() const = 0;
00082     virtual std::vector<unsigned int> get_neighbours(unsigned int vertex) const = 0;
00083     virtual unsigned int get_degree(unsigned int vertex) const = 0;
00084 };

00099 template <class T> class AdjacencyMap {
00100   private:
00101     std::map<unsigned int, T> values_;
00102     T default_value_;
00103   public:
00104     AdjacencyMap(T default_value) {
00105       default_value_ = default_value;
00106     }
00107 
00108     void add_neighbour(unsigned int vertex, T value) {
00109       values_[vertex] = value;
00110     }
00111 
00112     void remove_neighbour(unsigned int vertex) {
00113       values_.erase(vertex);
00114     }
00115 
00116     AdjacencyMap &operator=(const AdjacencyMap &map) {
00117       values_ = map.values_;
00118       return *this;
00119     }
00120 
00121     T &operator[](unsigned int vertex) {
00122       typename std::map<unsigned int, T>::iterator it = values_.find(vertex);
00123       if (it != values_.end()) {
00124         return (*it).second;
00125       } else {
00126         return default_value_;
00127       }
00128     }
00129 
00130     unsigned int size() {
00131       return values_.size();
00132     }
00133 
00134     std::vector<unsigned int> get_neighbours() {
00135       std::vector<unsigned int> neighbours;
00136       typename std::map<unsigned int, T>::iterator it;
00137       for(it=values_.begin();it!=values_.end();it++) {
00138         neighbours.push_back((*it).first);
00139       }
00140       return neighbours;
00141     }
00142 };

00160 class HyperGraph {
00161   private:
00162     std::map< unsigned int, std::vector<unsigned int> > edges_;
00163     std::map< unsigned int, std::vector<unsigned int> > vertices_;
00164     std::map< unsigned int, std::string > edge_labels_;
00165     std::map< unsigned int, std::string > vertex_labels_;
00166   public:
00167     HyperGraph();
00168     void add_hyperedge(unsigned int edge, std::vector<unsigned int> vertices);
00169     void set_edge_label(unsigned int edge, std::string label);
00170     void set_vertex_label(unsigned int vertex, std::string label);
00171     std::string get_edge_label(unsigned int edge);
00172     std::string get_vertex_label(unsigned int vertex);
00173     std::vector<unsigned int> get_edges_for_vertex(unsigned int vertex);
00174     template <class T> T &get_primal_graph() {
00175       T *graph;
00176       graph = new T(vertices_.size());
00177       for(std::map< unsigned int, std::vector<unsigned int> >::iterator it=edges_.begin();it!=edges_.end();it++) {
00178         std::vector<unsigned int> *vertices = &(*it).second;
00179         for(unsigned int i=0;i<vertices->size();i++) {
00180           for(unsigned int j=i+1;j<vertices->size();j++) {
00181             graph->add_edge((*vertices)[i], (*vertices)[j]);
00182           }
00183         }
00184       }
00185       return *graph;
00186     }
00187 };
